author: Joseph Zucker
title: Kofi Kingston Praises Rob Gronkowski Ahead of Star Hosting WWE WrestleMania 36
description: Former  WWE  champion  Kofi Kingston  wouldn't be surprised to see Rob Gronkowski's involvement with the company grow down the line and spoke highly of the retired NFL star...
content:
AMER HILABI/Getty Images
Former WWE champion Kofi Kingston wouldn't be surprised to see Rob Gronkowski's involvement with the company grow down the line and spoke highly of the retired NFL star.
During an appearance on Fox Sports' First Things First, Kingst… [+1747 chars]
